bal_devnet_2_status.highlight: bal-devnet-2 launched Friday; Nethermind and Nimbus EL have syncing issues
Nimbus issue relates to block access list for finalized blocks
Network configured at 150M gas; clients should verify compatibility
10MB block limit active (Fusaka); constrains blocks above ~104M gas

epbs_devnet_0_progress.highlight: Prysm: fork choice ready in 1-2 days; API and sync remain
Teku: passing Alpha 2 spec tests except fork choice
Nimbus: Alpha 2 PR merging imminently; fork choice deprioritized for DevNet 0
DevNet 0 will not focus on fork choice edge cases
Lodestar: passing Alpha 2 tests; fork choice refactoring in progress

eth70_and_gas_limits.highlight: ETH/70 implementation ready in Besu; testing against other clients needed
ETH/70 kurtosis testing shows clients still syncing unexpectedly
Full-sync bypasses receipts; snap-sync needed to trigger ETH/70 path
ETH/70 is critical blocker for scaling beyond 83M gas

gas_repricing_updates.highlight: EIP-7904 (compute repricing) has preliminary numbers; awaiting BAL-optimized benchmarks
EIP-8037 (state growth) specs progressing; multidimensional metering details being updated
EIP-7976/7981 (data repricing) most advanced; specs complete
Final repricing numbers expected end of March after BAL benchmarks complete
EIP-8037 recommended for DevNet 3 as most complex implementation

benchmarking_infrastructure.highlight: Benchmarkor tool released: consumes EEST fixtures and raw JSON tests
Benchmarkor supports stateful tests with 1.2-1.6TB snapshots via CoW filesystems
Benchmarkor includes UI for test heatmaps, resource graphs, and detailed logs
Carlos's standardized block metrics JSON format enables cross-client analysis

action_items.action: Set up isolated ETH/70 testnet for kurtosis validation
Clients reach readiness for ETH/70 testing and notify Barnabas/PK
Coordinate DevNet 3 scope: prioritize EIP-8037, consider data repricings

decisions.decision: Reduce bal-devnet-2 gas limit to 70M to focus on BAL testing
EPBS DevNet 0 will not test fork choice edge cases
ETH/70 should be tested in isolation before adding to BAL devnets
EIP-8037 (state growth) prioritized for DevNet 3 implementation

targets.target: End of March - Final gas repricing numbers after BAL benchmarks
